lang.never-logged-in: You never logged in to the system before.

info.username: Provide your username or your EMail-Address here.

bad-browser.message: You're using an outdated browser. You should consider updating

NotScheduleableException.title: Program not scheduable.
NotScheduleableException.explanation: You may add some more rooms to provide enough space.

AccessDeniedException.title: Access denied.
AccessDeniedException.explanation: You lack the right to access this page.
AccessDeniedException.not-logged-in: It may help to log in the system.

UnknownActionException.title: The requested page does not exist.
UnknownActionException.explanation: The page that you requested does not exist. In case you were following a link it seems to be broken. Please contact the administrator in that case. In case you were following a bookmark the page may have ceased to exist.

UnknownModuleException.title: The requested page does not exist. In case you were following a link it seems to be broken. Please contact the administrator in that case. In case you were following a bookmark the page may have ceased to exist.

NullPointerException.title: Internal Error.
NullPointerException.explanation: We’re sorry – an internal error occured. This should not happen at all. If you’re experiencing problems like this more often than you feel you should, please contact the administration.
